titleStmt.title: Mercy in her beauty, or, The height of a deliverance from the depth of danger set forth in the first sermon preached upon that occasion / by Nath. Hardy.
titleStmt.author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for Nath. Web and Will Grantham,

notesStmt.note: Copy on reel 741:10 appears as first sermon in the author's Two mites.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
